total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the two separate regions in the grid that are surrounded by 8s and filled with 0s and some other numbers.
Q2: For each region, identify the cells that are not 0s and note their values and positions.
Q3: Create a new grid with the same shape as the identified region.
Q4: Fill the new grid with 0s.
Q5: Replace the cells in the new grid that correspond to the non-zero cells in the identified region with their respective values.
Q6: Repeat the process for the second region.
Q1: Identify the two separate regions in the grid that are surrounded by 8s and filled with 0s.
Q2: In each region, identify the cells that are filled with numbers other than 0 and 8.
Q3: For each region, create a new grid that only includes the cells within the region, excluding the surrounding 8s.
Q4: In the new grids, replace the cells filled with 8s with 0s.
